channel.title: It is still not possible to copy/paste whispers if using Streamer Mode
channel.description:
#### What happened? When using Streamer Mode, the text in the box that shows whispers cannot be highlighted or selected for copy/pasting
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? People using regular mode can copy/paste whispers and you will sometimes be expected and demanded to paste a whisper, which you cannot do. This puts you at a gameplay disadvantage based on your UI settings.
#### Steps to reproduce: Enable Streamer Mode, whisper someone or receive a whisper, try to copy/paste it.
#### Comments:

item.title: It is still not possible to copy/paste whispers if using Streamer Mode
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
I can confirm this post. IDK if it is a bug or not or the devs just didnt finish developing it

Read full topic
item.source: It is still not possible to copy/paste whispers if using Streamer Mode

item.title: It is still not possible to copy/paste whispers if using Streamer Mode
item.dc:creator: FirstOfAllHowDareYou
item.description:
The bug is that you can do it one mode and not the other. Enabling both or disabling both would suffice to fix it.

Read full topic

item.description:
*correction: the bug is that you can copy whispers in normal mode

item.title: It is still not possible to copy/paste whispers if using Streamer Mode
item.dc:creator: FirstOfAllHowDareYou
item.description:
What happened?

When using Streamer Mode, the text in the box that shows whispers cannot be highlighted or selected for copy/pasting

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

People using regular mode can copy/paste whispers and you will sometimes be expected and demanded to paste a whisper, which you cannot do. This puts you at a gameplay disadvantage based on your UI settings.

Steps to reproduce:

Enable Streamer Mode, whisper someone or receive a whisper, try to copy/paste it.
